short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Write better, faster, and with more confidence using WordPal.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: WordPal is an AI-powered writing assistant that helps fix grammar errors, rephrase or generate new textual content, and summarize large texts instantly. It is available as a standalone app at https://wordpal.ai and also as a Chrome extension, which brings the same features to any web page you navigate.
